snippet.title: It Was You - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
A multiplayer murder mystery party for up to 12 players. Assume the role of Detective or Killer and use tools to uncover—or manipulate—evidence. Murder, investigate, discuss and deceive. Put your true-crime-solving skills to the test, or see if you are capable of cold-blooded murder.

Website: https://itwasyou.com
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1967050/It_Was_You
